      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.io.File baseDir)
                       throws VStoreException
        Throws:
        VStoreException

      • get

        public static FileManager get()
        Returns:
        Gets the instance of the file manager.

      • createDirectories

        private void createDirectories()

      • deleteFile

        public boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String fileUUID)
        Marks the given file for deletion. Once the corresponding node has replied that the file was deleted, you will be notified of the success with the following event: FileDeletedEvent
        Parameters:
        fileUUID - The UUID of the file to delete.
        Returns:
        True, in case of success.

      • getLocalFileList

        public void getLocalFileList(DBResultOrdering resultOrdering,
                             boolean onlyPending,
                             boolean onlyPrivate)
        Can be used to fetch a list of all files uploaded (or currently uploading) from this device. Results are published in the FilesReadyEvent.
        Parameters:
        resultOrdering - The order in which to fetch the files. (see DBResultOrdering).
        onlyPending - If true, only files that are pending to upload will be returned.
        onlyPrivate - If true, only files that are marked private will be returned.

      • getMimetypeUriForFile

        public java.lang.String getMimetypeUriForFile(java.lang.String uuid)
        This method returns the request address of a file's mime type from the node.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the file to request the type for.
        Returns:
        The address to contact to retrieve the mime type of the given file. Returns null, if no uuid is given.

      • getMetadataUriForFile

        public java.lang.String getMetadataUriForFile(java.lang.String uuid,
                                              boolean fullMetadata)
        This method provides the url to request metadata for a file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the file to request the type for.
        fullMetadata - If set to true, the uri for requesting full metadata is returned (e.g. with context information). If set to false, the uri for requesting lightweight metadata is returned.
        Returns:
        The uri.

      • getFile

        public void getFile(java.lang.String uuid,
                    java.io.File dir)
        Use this method to request the full file with the given UUID. Subscribe to the event DownloadProgressEvent to get notified about the state of the request for this file UUID. Additionally, listen to the DownloadFailedEvent to get notified if a file download failed. When the download is ready, you will be notified by the DownloadedFileReadyEvent.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the file to retrieve.
        dir - If specified, the file will be placed in this directory.

      • isMyFile

        public boolean isMyFile(java.lang.String fileUuid)
        Checks if the file with the given UUID was published before by this device.
        Parameters:
        fileUuid - The UUID to check
        Returns:
        True, if this phone uploaded the file.

      • isMimeTypeSupported

        public static boolean isMimeTypeSupported(java.lang.String mimetype)
        This method checks, if the given string is a mime type supported by the framework. For supported types see VFileType.
        Parameters:
        mimetype - The mime type string, e.g. "image/jpeg".
        Returns:
        True, if the type is supported. False, if not.

      • getSupportedTypes

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSupportedTypes()
        Get a list of file types that are supported by the vStore framework.
        Returns:
        Returns a HashMap where the keys represent file extensions and the values represent the corresponding MIME type.

      • getVStoreDir

        public java.io.File getVStoreDir()
        Returns:
        The base directory where vstore will store all its files.

      • getStoredFilesDir

        public java.io.File getStoredFilesDir()
        Returns the File object of the directory where the framework stores user files.
        Returns:
        A File object describing the stored files directory.

      • getDownloadedFilesDir

        public java.io.File getDownloadedFilesDir()
        Returns the File object of the directory where the framework stores downloaded files.
        Returns:
        A File object describing the download directory.

      • getThumbnailsDir

        public java.io.File getThumbnailsDir()
        Returns the File object of the directory where the framework stores thumbnail files.
        Returns:
        A File object describing the thumbnail directory.

      • getPrefFileDir

        public java.io.File getPrefFileDir()
